2.1.2.2 ELABORATION AND DISCUSSION

Tuning

Tuning requirements deal with part to part fitting. This is a problem that is detected at assembly time. An assembly analysis application, which is not currently within the scope of DFM would address this problem.

Models for Concurrent Engineering Design - 15 Jul 1997
